p: Fresh aerial parts of Montanoa quadrangularis (Asteraceae) were collected in flowering stage in “Los Topes” Farm, Chiguará, Mérida state at 1250 m.a.s.l. A voucher specimen, code AM 16, was deposited in the Dr Luis E. Ruiz T. Herbarium, Faculty of Pharmacy and Bioanalysis, University of Los Andes, Venezuela.
